title: Peanut Brittle with Yummi Nuts Salted Peanuts
ingredients: 1 ½ cups Yummi Nuts Salted Peanuts.
instructions: Step 1. Line a tray with greased parchment paper.
Step 2. Prepare a caramel: in a saucepan over heat, add the water, sugar, and corn syrup.
Step 3. Boil the mixture over high heat.
Step 4. Once it reaches an amber color, remove from heat and add the baking soda, butter, and vanilla. (Stir).
Step 5. Add the Yummi Nuts Salted Peanuts and stir a couple of times.
Step 6. Pour the mixture onto the tray.
Step 7. Sprinkle with salt and let it cool at room temperature.
